### Split dataset into train and test data
```{r}
set.seed(123)
data1= sample.split(total,SplitRatio = 0.3)
train_dataset_total =subset(total,data1==TRUE)
test_dataset_total =subset(total,data1==FALSE)
```


### Estimation of various SVM
```{r}
svm_1 <- svm(Umsatz ~ Weekday + Month + preweek_turnover_1 + Semesterferien + Kieler_Woche, data=train_dataset_total, ranges = list(epsilon = seq(0.2,1,0.1), cost = 2^(2:3)))

```
